name: JobVirtue
tag_list: job-search, job, career, employment, job-hunt, job-posting, find-a-job, post-a-job, job-listings, job-openings, job-vacancies, part-time-jobs
overview:
JobVirtue is a convenient, easy-to-use job search website.

Everyone is welcome to use JobVirtue to search for vacancies. Itâ€™s free to register and take advantage of the complete range of services. Look for a job or connect with other job seekers on the JV Social Network. Video Chat and Video Interview are options that are also available. The Career Help section demonstrates how to create your own video resume and job-hunt successfully. After registration you will be notified of new job postings by email job alerts (coming soon). Job seekers can search for jobs by choosing their province, city and occupation preferences. The advanced search function includes more detail in searching criteria.

JobVirtue has a number of features to help employers find the right person for the job, including screening applicants, the ability to search for staff based on criteria in your advertisement, high visibility of your jobs, a secure personal page to manage your jobs, instant notification of new applications, and the ability to filter responses.
